title: You hear heavy footsteps approaching you...
description: The screeching sound of a blade's edge slowly makes its way around the corner.
"Hello, dear old friend," he said, half out of breath, his brows unfurrowing at your gaze.
He kneels, laying his axe on the ground.
"I cannot believe you're back," he said, grinning.
"Please, let's continue where we left off."

outcomeText: He nods his head out of respect.
He slowly walks out, leaving his axe at your footstep.

preventEvents.title: A shadow faintly scurries along the room.

outcomeText: He slowly walks back. On his way out, he shatters a vase full of blood.
